gate.description: A credit score is a numerical representation of a person's creditworthiness and is used by lenders to evaluate their ability to repay loans. Maintaining a good credit score is essential as it can lead to a number of benefits. First and foremost, having a good credit score makes it easier to obtain loans, credit cards, and other financial products with favourable terms and lower interest rates.
gate.title: Testnet Climber!
gate.label: Testnet
gate.share-title: Check your Testnet Climber Credential @ Gateway

about.title: # of Transactions
about.caption: See if you qualify for a top TestNet user Credential!

details.title: Details
details.description: This credential is issued to all users who have used the Altitude DeFi testnet over the course of the past couple of months. As of July 30th this testnet came to an end. And now it is time to recognize the most consistent and active degens climbing to the top of Altitude DeFi's network.

how.title: Here's how!
how.description: Gateway's API is collecting data from Altitude's Testnet, packaging the information into a user-owned, highly portable, and easily verifiable credential. This credential is static and serves as a proof of protocol participation.

why.title: Why?
why.description: In the Future Credentials will become a part of your DeFi experience on Altitude DeFi.

no-score.title: Your credit score is based on your history of activity interacting with lending protocols and digital assets. Once you have enough activity, you'll automatically get a score that'll help you manage your on-chain finances.

modal.title: Your credential is being issued
modal.description: It only takes a few seconds.
